mapper.delete: delete from replelikes where userNo = #{userNo} and repleNo = #{repleNo}
mapper.select: select count(l.userNo) from reple r left join replelikes l on(r.no = l.repleNo and l.userNo = #{userNo}) where postNo = #{postNo} group by r.no;
